I am a PhD student in <span class="dark-green-text">Economics</span> at [<span class="dark-green-text">CREST</span>](https://crest.science/) ([Institut Polytechnique de Paris](https://www.ip-paris.fr/en)), advised by [Geoffrey Barrows](https://sites.google.com/site/geoffreybarrows/) and [Florian Grosset-Touba](https://www.fgrosset.com/). 

My research lies at the intersection of <span class="light-green-text">international trade</span> and <span class="light-green-text">environmental economics</span>, with a focus on the propagation of local climate shocks. I am particularly interested in <span class="light-green-text">maritime transportation</span>.

From January to June 2026, I will be visiting Berkeley Agricultural & Resource Economics department, hosted by [Thibault Fally](https://fally.are.berkeley.edu/index.html).
